LanguageData.OE_Eidolon.title: obsidia empire eidolon
LanguageData.OE_Eidolon.description: [PAWN_nameDef] once considered a great Hero of Obsidia but after some events it became forgotten and abandoned by its own people. Has excellent combat skills and the ability to maintain own reputation.
LanguageData.OE_Tactician.title: obsidia empire tactician
LanguageData.OE_Tactician.description: [PAWN_nameDef] once served as a strategic mastermind of the Obsidia command corps. After a failed campaign, vanished from records-yet still fights with clarity and resolve.
LanguageData.OE_Soulforger.title: obsidia empire soulforger
LanguageData.OE_Soulforger.description: [PAWN_nameDef] once shaped synthetic souls and psionic engines in secret halls of the Empire. Some called it brilliance, others-blasphemy.
LanguageData.OE_Datasplicer.title: obsidia empire datasplicer
LanguageData.OE_Datasplicer.description: [PAWN_nameDef] once cracked Obsidia’s sealed data-vaults and rewrote chains of command from the inside. Now drifts between firewalls like a ghost.
